headline: Baron Small Cap Fund Sold SBA Communications Corp. (SBAC) on Price Appreciation
summary: Baron Funds, an investment management company, released its “Baron Small Cap Fund” first-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the first quarter of 2025, the fund was down 9.07% (Institutional Shares) compared to the Russell 2000 Growth Index’s (the Index) -11.12% return. Small-cap stocks continued to underperform larger […]
